mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE (ID, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_IMAGE_NAME, NOTICE_IMAGE_UUID, NOTICE_IMAGE_SIZE,NOTICE_IMAGE_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL,#{adminId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeImageName}, #{noticeImageUuid},#{noticeImageSize},#{noticeImagePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(N.ID) FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_NOTICE N ON U.ID = N.ADMIN_ID

SELECT NOTICE_TITLE, USER_IDENTIFICATION,NOTICE_VIEWED_COUNT,NOTICE_CREATED_DATE FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_TITLE, USER_IDENTIFICATION,NOTICE_VIEWED_COUNT,NOTICE_CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_NOTICE N ON U.ID = N.ADMIN_ID ORDER BY N.ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <=5
